EmailTemplate.subject: Primary Enrichment Online Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
20th March 2015
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}
The online registration for Primary Enrichment activities will be available on Monday 23rd March from 9am until Friday 27th March 2pm. Please click here to download the list of Enrichment activities available.
For registration please use the following forms:
Years 1 & 2
Years 3 & 4
Years 5 & 6
Kind regards Admin Team
{!Contact.SchoolText__c} World Class Education
